messages.Login.InvalidCredentials.Description: Double check your credentials and try again or press "Lost Password?"
messages.Login.InvalidLogin.Description: Double check your credentials and try again or press "Lost Password?"
messages.Login.MissingLogin.Description: Did you forget to provide credentials?
messages.Login.InvalidRecoveryCode.Description: Check your recovery code and try again.
messages.Login.UnsupportedAuthentication.Descript: We don't support this authentication method. Please try another.
messages.Login.EmailNotVerified.Description: Your email is not verified, check your inbox for an email from us, ensure you check your spam folder.
messages.Login.UnknownError.Description: An unknown error, occured during login. Please contact support at support.resonite.com
messages.Register.MissingRequest.Description: We couldn't find any registration details. Make sure to include them when registering.
messages.Register.UsernameTooLong.Description: We allow usernames up to 32 characters long.
messages.Register.InvalidDateOfBirth.Description: Your date of birth is invalid.
messages.Register.UserContainsBlockedTerms.Descri: Your username contains blocked words. If you believe this is an error contact support.resonite.com.
messages.Register.MissingPassword.Description: You did not provide a password.
messages.Register.InvalidPassword.Description: Your password is invalid. It must contain at least 8 characters, 1 digit, 1 uppercase letter and 1 lowercase letter.
messages.Register.EmailAlreadyRegistered.Descript: An account using this email already exists, if you've forgotten your password you can click "Lost Password". Or you can contact support at support.resonite.com.
messages.Register.UsernameAlreadyRegistered.Descr: An account using this username already exists, if you've forgotten your password you can click "Lost Password". Or you can contact support at support.resonite.com.
messages.Recovery.IncorrectEmail.Description: You've entered an incorrect email for password recovery. Please check your details and try again.
messages.Register.UnknownError.Description: An unknown error, occured during registration. Please contact support at support.resonite.com
messages.Account.RememberMe:
Remember Me
(logs out after 30 days of inactivity)
messages.Account.LiveEmailWarning: <color=#f00>WARNING:</color> live.com, hotmail.com, outlook.com and other Microsoft-hosted services can take up to 1-2 days to accept the email.
messages.Account.ResetPasswordInstructions: A recovery code has been sent to your email. Copy it to the field below:
messages.Account.RegistrationSuccess:
Success!

An email has been sent to {email} with a verification link.

Once you click on this link, we'll automatically log you in as long as this dialog is open.

If you run into problems, reach us at {appEmail} or {appCommunity}
messages.Account.PoliciesAgreement: I agree to the <color=#22B2FF>terms of service</color> and <color=#22B2FF>privacy policy</color>
messages.Account.AlternateMethods: Login with a 3rd party service instead:
messages.Account.Saml2.Title: SAML 2.0
messages.Account.Saml2.Select: Please select the SAML 2.0 provider you want to use:
messages.Account.Saml2.LoggingIn: Waiting for the login to complete (check your web browser)...
messages.Account.TOTP.Title: Two Factor Authentication
messages.Account.TOTP.Initializing: Checking status of 2FA for your account...
messages.Account.TOTP.Code.Description:
First you need to input a secret code to your TOTP authentication app such as Authy or Google Authenticator.

We recommend doing this by scanning the QR code, but alternatively you can manually input the secret code. Never share this code with anyone.

If you're in VR you can switch to desktop by pressing F8.
messages.Account.TOTP.RecoveryCodes.Description: Save these codes in a secure location. They can be used to recover access to your account in case you lose or damage your phone. Each code can be used only once. Never share them with anyone. If you lose them, you will PERMANENTLY lose access to your account.
messages.Account.TOTP.Activate.Description:
In order to activate the 2FA on your account, use the 6-digit token generated by your authenticator app to ensure that everything is working correctly.

Once activated, you'll need to use the code to confirm certain operations.
messages.Account.TOTP.Message.AlreadySetup: 2FA has already been setup on your account!
messages.Account.TOTP.Message.Error: Unexpected error! Please try again later.
messages.Account.TOTP.Message.SetupComplete:
Congratulations!

Your account is now setup with 2FA for extra protection!

You can optionally enable this for account login with /enableLogin2FA command.
messages.Account.TOTP.Deactivate.Description:
2FA is currently setup and active on your account. If you need to deactivate it (e.g. due to loss of your phone or the codes being compromised), you can do so here.

After deactivation, you can setup 2FA again, which will generate a brand new secret code and new set of recovery codes.

If you lose your phone and need to setup 2FA again, we STRONGLY advise you do so immediately, as each recovery code can be used only once and after you run out you'll be completely locked out of your account.
messages.Account.TOTP.Message.DeactivationComplet:
2FA has been successfully deactivated on your account.

Your account is now at increased risk!

We strongly recommend setting up 2FA again immediately, especially if you used a recovery code due to losing your phone.
messages.Session.JoinVerifier.EnableText: <color=red>WARNING:</color> You are about to enable custom join verification that is part of the current world. Before you do so, make sure you trust the creator of the world, as custom verifier can bypass standard session access rules and allow or block entry to users using its own rules.
messages.Session.JoinVerifier.Label: Use Custom Join Verifier: {name}
messages.Session.JoinVerifier.ComponentWarning: <color=red>WARNING:</color> At the moment, there is no mechanism to prevent tampering with the verifier once enabled. If tampering with the ProtoFlux setup for verification is a concern, DO NOT USE this feature and DO NOT ENABLE it in your worlds.
messages.Session.JoinVerifier.SetCustomVerifier: Set as custom join request verifier

messages.FullBody.Title: Full Body / Avatar Calibration
messages.FullBody.HeightInstructions: Make sure this is your actual height, otherwise calibration won't work correctly. The mannequin should fit the headset and controllers.
messages.FullBody.HeightWarning: This seems incorrect. Make sure it's your actual height.
messages.FullBody.MappingInstructions: Stand in upright position and ensure the trackers are tracking and detected correctly.
messages.FullBody.JustCalibrateAvatarDescription: Skip full body calibration and just calibrate the avatar
messages.FullBody.CalibrateInstructions: Align yourself with the red body overlay in your playspace and press both triggers to confirm. Make sure your real feet and hips match the virtual ones as close as possible.
messages.FullBody.BeforeCalibrationInstructions: Make sure trackers are tracking and your height is set
messages.FullBody.CalibratingPoseInstructions: Align yourself with the reference and press both triggers to confirm
messages.FullBody.AdjustAvatarInstructions: Adjust avatar body offsets to best match the reference
messages.FullBody.FineTuneCalibrationInstructions: Verify and fine tune calibration by moving blue references
messages.FullBody.CalibrateTrackersInstructions:
Grab and position the blue body parts relative to the trackers to adjust their offset. They should match the location of the tracker on your body.
You can adjust calibration anytime later by reopening this tool.
messages.FullBody.HeightCompensationInstructions: If the mannequin is too tall (hunched) or too short, adjust the height compensation for best fit.
messages.FullBody.CalibrateAvatarInstructions: Make sure all body parts are mapped and then drag the blue spheres around, to make the avatar best match the body reference.
messages.FullBody.AvatarHeightCompensationInstruc: If the avatar is too tall (ends up hunched up) or too short for you, adjust its height compensation here so it better fits your height.
messages.FullBody.AvatarSaveWarning: Don't forget to save your avatar after you're finished calibrating it!
messages.FullBody.CalibrationFinishedInstructions: If you're satisfied with the calibration, you can save your avatar now and exit.
messages.FullBody.CalibrationRedoInstructions:
If the calibration is off or you want to calibrate more avatars you can make more adjustments. You can also reopen this calibrator any time in the future to make adjustments.
If you've only changed your trackers, you don't need to calibrate your avatars again.
messages.CameraControl.Title: Camera Control
messages.CameraControl.Anchors.NoAnchors: No camera anchors in this world
messages.CameraControl.OBS.Instructions: Make sure that OBS is running, we support OBS version 28+.
messages.CameraControl.OBS.OpenInstallerReason: This webpage lets you download the OBS websocket plugin

Removing this component through any means other than the dedicated buttons below will trip the protection mechanism and lead to self destruction and potential data loss!

messages.Inspector.DynamicBoneChain.AddFixedColli: Add fixed colliders from hierarchy (using object root)
messages.Inspector.CharacterController.Warning:
WARNING!
It is possible to use this component as a simple rigidbody by checking SimulateRotation. Before you do, please understand that it is not optimized for this purpose and proper Rigidbody Support is coming in the future.
Proper rigidbody support will offer:
- CPU and network efficiency - with CharacterController you'll be getting higher CPU usage and significant amount of network traffic
- Constraints - you'll be able to create joints, hinges, springs and other constraints between rigidbodies
- Smooth simulation and interactions for everyone - CharacterController will glitch out if another person tries to interact
- New Features and Tools - to make using them much easier
-----------------------
As long as you understand those limitations, have fun!
messages.Inspector.PrimitiveMemberEditor.Warning:
WARNING!
It is possible to use this component to interact with references by using their IDs. This process is commonly called 'Ref Hacking'.

Before you do this, please understand that this is not supported and may break at any time. Do not rely on this functionality for your creations.

messages.Wizard.CubemapCreator.TexturesNote: Note that some conventions have left and right swapped. If the resulting cubemap is incorrect, try swapping the left and right textures.

messages.Desktop.Controls.Title: Desktop Controls
messages.Tutorial.Welcome.Description:
Dive into a brand new digital universe with infinite possibilities. Whether you come here to socialize and hang out with people around the world or to build, create and develop anything from beautiful art, interactive avatars and gadgets, to complex interactive worlds and games, Resonite is an endlessly customizable place where you'll be welcome and where you'll find a group to resonate with.

Before you start exploring, we'll first guide you through setting up some essentials, to ensure a smooth experience. When you're ready, click the button below
messages.Tutorial.Welcome.AccountDescription: Creating an Account gives you 1 GB free storage and access to saving items, favoriting avatars, adding contacts and messaging.
messages.Tutorial.Welcome.AccountSkipDescription: Some functionality like saving items to inventory, favoriting avatar or adding contacts won't be accessible.
messages.Tutorial.Welcome.SettingsDescription: You can configure basic motion and user preferences. All of these can be changed at later point.
messages.Tutorial.Welcome.SettingsSnapTurnDescrip: Instantly snaps to new angle, ideal for new users
messages.Tutorial.Welcome.SettingsSmoothTurnDescr: Gradually turns, but can cause nausea.
messages.Tutorial.Welcome.StartTutorialDescriptio: You're all setup and almost ready to go! We will now transfer you to our tutorial world. At the end, there's a brand new homeworld that's waiting for you, which will serve as your base for exploring {appName}. When you are ready, click the button below.
messages.Tutorial.CommunityYouTube.Title: Community YouTube Channels
messages.Tutorial.Intro.BadgesDescription: Badges are small icons which show aspects of a user. Here are a few important badges to remember. The disability badges can be self assigned though the {appName} bot. For more information please check the {appName} Wiki
messages.Twitch.Panel.Button.SubscriberCommands.E:
Subscriber Commands
Enabled for Subscribers Only
messages.Exiting.SavingItems: Saving {n, plural, one {# item} other {# items}}...
messages.Migration.Title: Migration
messages.Migration.LoginModal.Title: Migrate data?
messages.Migration.LoginModal.Description: Would you like to migrate data from another account? You can choose to do this later from the "Migration" tab on the dash as well.
messages.Migration.LoginResetID.Title: Really reset UserID?
messages.Migration.LoginResetID.Description: Please understand that doing this will result in <color=red>UNPREDICTABLE CONTENT BREAKAGE</color>. All your items, worlds, contacts and messages will be migrated successfully, but any behaviors and components that rely on referencing your old UserID will likely break and require to be re-setup and be repaired. Unless you have a serious reason to want to reset your UserID, <color=red>DO NOT CHOOSE THIS OPTION</color>.
messages.Migration.ReservedUsername.Title: Reserved Username
messages.Migration.ReservedUsername.Description: This username is reserved for original owner. If this is your account, please provide your {platform} credentials to unlock it. We do not store these credentials, they are only used to verify the ownership of your account on registration.
messages.Migration.Dialog.Title: Account Migration
messages.Migration.Dialog.Source: You can migrate data from any compatible infrastructure. First select one from the list below that you'd like to migrate data from. You can add additional infrastructures by placing config files in the "Migrations" folder in the installation.
messages.Migration.Dialog.AccountDescription: To migrate your account, we'll need your {platform} account password. This will let us login to it and access the data.
messages.Migration.ResetID.Title: Reset my UserID
messages.Migration.ResetID.Description: WARNING: Choosing this option WILL PARTIALLY BREAK EXISTING CONTENT AND IS IRREVERSIBLE, this includes any UserID references in user content, community services, links, cloud variables and more. These references will be reset, but your items, worlds, contacts and messages themselves will not be lost. We recommend using this option ONLY if you would like to get rid of your old UserId and replace it with a new randomized one. Unless you have a strong reason to reset your UserID, you SHOULD NOT check this option. Your UserID will change like this: U-MyUsername -> U-fX3pKe7AYYQ
messages.Migration.DataSelection.Title: When we migrate your account, what data should we migrate?
messages.Migration.DataSelection.Favorites.Descri: This will migrate your home, favorite avatar, keyboard, camera and dash first, so you can start using them as soon as possible. WARNING: If you choose this option, you might LOSE ANY CHANGES made on this platform before the migration to your favorites.
messages.Migration.DataSelection.Favorites.Overwr: When migrating should we overwrite your favorites?
messages.Migration.DataSelection.Home.Title: Set your old home as default?
messages.Migration.DataSelection.Home.Description: When we migrate your data, your original cloud home will be placed under different URL and you will get a brand new cloud home as default. However if you'd prefer, we can default your old home as the default one. Even if you select "No", your old cloud home will still be accessible and you can favorite it as your default later.
messages.Migration.Groups.Title: Migrate Groups
messages.Migration.Groups.Description: All groups you are administrator of will be migrated by default. If you'd like to migrate only select groups, click the button below to load them and then check the groups you'd like to migrate.
messages.Migration.Groups.NotGroupAdmin: You're not an admin of any {platform} groups, ask your group admins to migrate the group!
messages.Migration.Summary:
Ok, we have everything we need. Click Start Migration below and we'll get started on your migration.

Migration might take a while, we've gotta copy everything across. If you've selected to migrate your favorites, we'll prioritize them so that you can get comfortable.

You don't need to keep {appName} running whilst we're migrating, but we'll send you updates via the {appName} bot to let you know how its going.
messages.Migration.List.EmptyTitle: Looking to start a new Migration?
messages.Migration.List.EmptySubtitle: Click on "New Migration Task" in the top left.
messages.Migration.Report.Title: Migration Task Report:
messages.Migration.Report.EstimatedQueuePosition: <color={hex}>Remaining tasks in queue before this one:</color> {value}
messages.Migration.ColorManagement:
This world has been authored in gamma space and has been automatically converted to linear.

It may look different from original, but should be generally usable.

If you are the author and you find any issues with the conversion of world DO NOT SAVE. Only save copies.

As long as the original exists, we can tweak conversion process. Otherwise you will be responsible to fix it yourself.
messages.Temporary.MMC.Categories.Name: Categories
messages.Temporary.MMC.VoteFailure: Vote failed, your vote has not been registered please try again.
messages.Temporary.MMC.VoteInvalid: Vote is invalid, please try again.
messages.Tutorial.Saving.Title: Welcome Home!
messages.Tutorial.Saving.Content:
Welcome to your Home world! This is where you'll end up every time you log in.

This is a world all your own, so any changes you make are able to be saved.

If you save, everything will be just as you left it when you return!
messages.Tutorial.Teleporter.Error:
Failed to load your cloud home!
Step out of the teleporter and step back in to try again.
messages.CloudHome.Info.DashInfoTab.Title: Welcome!
messages.CloudHome.Info.DashInfoDesktop:
Just to get you up to speed, there's a couple things you should know. You have a Dashboard that you can open by pressing Escape. Think of it as your desktop or control panel.

If you're confused, this display has some additional info to help you out. Click the button below to dismiss this message.
messages.CloudHome.Info.DashInfoVR:
Just to get you up to speed, there's a couple things you should know. You have a Dashboard that you can open by pressing B or Y. Think of it as your desktop or control panel.

If you're confused, this display has some additional info to help you out. Click the button below to dismiss this message.
messages.CloudHome.Info.DashInfoVRNoButtons:
Just to get you up to speed, there's a couple things you should know. You have a Dashboard that you can open by pressing and holding the Menu button until the circle completes. Think of it as your desktop or control panel.

If you're confused, this display has some additional info to help you out. Click the button below to dismiss this message.
messages.CloudHome.Info.ModerationTab.Title: Moderation!
messages.CloudHome.Info.ModerationTab.Content:
Safety is important to us. If you need help or need to report a user, open a ticket in our Moderation Portal.

We have a strong team of volunteer moderators keeping the community safe! Please submit a ticket if you have questions or see guideline-breaking behavior.
messages.CloudHome.Info.InventoryTab.Title: Save Your Items!
messages.CloudHome.Info.InventoryTab.Content:
The Inventory in your Dashboard contains your saved avatars and items.

The Essentials folder has some fun things to play with; double click an item to spawn it!
messages.CloudHome.Info.ToolsTab.Title: In-World Editing!
messages.CloudHome.Info.ToolsTab.Content:
A hallmark of {appName} is being able to easily create or modify things right in-game.

Yes, that means right here! Or anywhere really - the tools available to you via Essentials -> Tools in your inventory allow you to easily edit the world around you to your liking.
messages.CloudHome.Info.HelpTab.Title: Getting Help
messages.CloudHome.Info.HelpTab.InfoLineOne: Need help? Take a look at our <u><color=hero.cyan>Wiki</color></u><sprite name=hyperlink>, or get answers to your
messages.CloudHome.Info.HelpTab.InfoLineTwo: questions in our Discord! Handily, you can view links on your desktop through your Dashboard in the Desktop tab.
messages.CloudHome.Info.UsersTab.Title: Finding Users
messages.CloudHome.Info.UsersTab.Content:
Public sessions are a great way to immerse yourself in the community!

Public sessions which you can join right now can be found in the Worlds tab in your dashboard. Check it out!
messages.StickyNote.RelevantLinks:
Relevant links!
<--

One could even call it a linking book
messages.StickyNote.SunTool: Hold the power of the sun in your hands!
messages.StickyNote.Bow: Pull back your String and aim true
messages.StickyNote.Crossbow: Lever Action (or use secondary) to load
messages.StickyNote.TheaterTablet: Use this tablet to control the fan and window tint for this room!
messages.StickyNote.ControlTablet: Use this tablet to control parts of the home!
messages.StickyNote.DipBrushes: Dip brushes in orbs to use materials
messages.StickyNote.BrushColor: Change the brush color and size in your Context Menu
messages.StickyNote.Drawing: You can draw on the board, in the air, or anywhere!
messages.CloudHome.FeaturedPanel.LinkText:
Open this world for
yourself by clicking here!
messages.CloudHome.AvatarPanel.Title: Featured Avatar Worlds
messages.CloudHome.SupporterPanel.Title: Our Supporters
messages.Tutorial.InfoPanel.Title: Hey! Before you go...
messages.Tutorial.InfoPanel.Content:
There's a world of possibilities waiting for you, and what's possible is limited only by your imagination.

Almost all of the things you've seen so far were made right in-game! People from across the world worked together in real-time to build it.

The platform is still very much in early development and we're updating and improving things constantly. But you're part of this journey too, and the sky is the limit!

Thanks for stopping in and giving us a try.
messages.Tutorial.Panel.Jumping.Title: Jumping
messages.Tutorial.Panel.Jumping.ContentDesktop: While in Walk locomotion, press space bar to jump!
messages.Tutorial.Panel.Jumping.ContentVR: While in Walk locomotion, press in on your joystick to jump!
messages.Tutorial.Panel.Jumping.ContentVRNoButton: While in Walk locomotion, press in on the center of your trackpad to jump!
messages.Tutorial.Panel.WalkLocomotion.Title: Walk Locomotion
messages.Tutorial.Panel.WalkLocomotion.Content: Move and jump along the ground.
messages.Tutorial.Panel.TeleportLocomotion.Title: Teleport Locomotion
messages.Tutorial.Panel.TeleportLocomotion.Conten: Teleport instantly sends you to the teleportation indicator.
messages.Hints.Spawn.InitialMovementDesktop: Use the movement keys to walk around!
messages.Hints.Spawn.InitialMovementVR: Use your joysticks to walk around!
messages.Hints.Spawn.InitialMovementVRNoButtons: Use your trackpads to walk around!
messages.Hints.Spawn.ContextMenuDesktop: Open your Context Menu by pressing T for options!
messages.Hints.Spawn.ContextMenuVR: Feeling sick? Open your Context Menu by pressing B or Y for options!
messages.Hints.Spawn.ContextMenuVRNoButtons: Feeling sick? Open your Context Menu by pressing the Menu button for options!
messages.Hints.Spawn.TeleportLocomotionDesktop: Other locomotion options, such as fly, are available to try in the Locomotion menu.
messages.Hints.Spawn.TeleportLocomotionVR: Other locomotion options, such as teleport or fly, are available to try in the Locomotion menu.
messages.Hints.Bridge.RaiseTheWorld: Press this button to bring the platform to you!
messages.Hints.Grabbing.GrabbingDesktop: Physically grab things by holding the right mouse button!
messages.Hints.Grabbing.GrabbingVR: Physically grab things by holding Grip!
messages.Hints.Grabbing.Rotating: Rotate held items by holding E and moving your mouse!
messages.Hints.Grabbing.RotatingExtra: Hold Shift and E together to rotate an object around its horizontal axis!
messages.Hints.Grabbing.ScalingDesktop: Grab an item, hold shift, and use your scroll wheel to scale it!
messages.Hints.Grabbing.ScalingVR: Physically grab things with both hands to scale them!
messages.Hints.Grabbing.OtherGrabbables: There are a variety of interactables, play with these three to see how they work!
messages.Hints.Grabbing.OtherGrabbablesExtraDeskt: In addition to scaling objects, you can also scale yourself by enabling scaling in your Context Menu, then holding control and using your scroll wheel!
messages.Hints.Grabbing.OtherGrabbablesExtraVR: In addition to scaling objects, you can also scale yourself by enabling scaling in your Context Menu, grabbing in front of you with both hands, and moving them closer or further apart!
messages.Hints.Telescope.Alignment: Grab the telescope and aim it at the moon!
messages.Hints.Telescope.TheMoonDesktop: While aiming at the moon, hold right click and look around to move the moon!
messages.Hints.Telescope.TheMoonVR: Deploy your laser with the Trigger button and grab the moon!
messages.Hints.Sundial.SoftEquip: Grab this tool to use it!
messages.Hints.Sundial.SoftEquipExtra: Tools let you change the world around you in a variety of ways!
messages.Hints.Sundial.HardEquip: Click on this tool to equip it!
messages.Hints.Sundial.HardEquipExtra: Don't see your laser? Slightly Hold your Trigger to reveal it!
messages.Hints.Sundial.TheSun: Aim at the sky and click to move the sun there!
messages.Hints.Sundial.TheSunExtra: Try aiming below the horizon to make it night!
messages.Hints.Sundial.Dequip: Drop the equipped tool by choosing Dequip in your Context Menu.
messages.Hints.Sundial.DequipExtra: Notice the options in your Context Menu have changed because you're holding this tool.
messages.Hints.Sundial.Teleporter: Press this button to activate the Teleporter to your Cloud Home!
messages.Hints.Sundial.TeleporterExtra: Enjoy your home and thanks for stopping by!
messages.Tools.Names.Label: Label Tool
